intents.name: physics_query
intents.description: Questions about physics, mechanics, relativity, quantum theory
examples: How do particles behave at the quantum level?
What are the laws of thermodynamics?

intents.name: chemistry_query
intents.description: Questions about chemistry, molecules, reactions, elements
examples: What makes water a polar molecule?

intents.name: biology_query
intents.description: Questions about biology, life, organisms, genetics
examples: What is the process of photosynthesis?

intents.name: interdisciplinary
examples: How do physics and biology connect?
How does chemistry relate to life?
